job_tasks.phrase: Experiment and Innovate with AI: Work with cutting-edge AI technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude, to create autonomous tools and interactive features that redefine how students learn.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly mentions working with LLMs (GPT-4, Claude) and creating tools/features, which aligns with the core of generative AI modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop AI-Powered Web Applications: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components, with a focus on enhancing user experience through AI.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of web applications, integrating front-end and back-end, which is a key software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: integrate both front-end and back-end components
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions working on both front-end and back-end development, a core aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: taking ownership of the entire product.
job_tasks.justification: This implies responsibility for the full software development lifecycle of a product.

job_tasks.phrase: Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights taking ownership of the full development process, from requirements to launch, which is a comprehensive software development responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Your work will directly impact thousands of students, ensuring that our tools meet their needs and set new standards for educational technology.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase demonstrates understanding the business context and impact on end-users (students) within the educational technology domain.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate and Communicate: Partner with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts. Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
job_tasks.justification: This directly mentions collaboration with a team and the importance of effective communication.

job_tasks.phrase: Continuous Improvement: Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes continuous learning and staying updated with advancements in AI and web development.

job_tasks.phrase: create autonomous tools and interactive features
job_tasks.justification: This refers to building AI-driven features and tools, which falls under the modeling aspect of GenAI.

job_tasks.phrase: translate them into fully developed products
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the process of taking high-level ideas and turning them into complete software products.

soft_skills.phrase: innovative thinkers who can seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems, taking ownership of the entire product.
Take ownership of the entire development process

Collaborate and Communicate: Partner with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts. Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
Continuous Improvement: Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.

You won't be handed fully fleshed-out requirements. Instead, you will take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products, leveraging your expertise in AI and full-stack development.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with LLMs (GPT-4, Claude) to create AI-powered applications, integrating them across full-stack development. Core responsibilities include experimenting with AI technologies and building user-facing systems, aligning perfectly with the definition of a GenAI Engineer.
